response.summary:
Ingeniero Mecánico egresado de la Universidad Nacional de Colombia, cuyo desempeño ingenieril se valida en :
- Experiencia en planear, diseñar, controlar y aplicar metodologías asociadas al mantenimiento preventivo y correctivo de los equipos Mecánicos tales como Motores Diesel, Bombas, Compresores.
- Experiencia en planeación y control de proyectos, aplicando el diseño de ingeniería en una adecuada selección de equipos, de recurso humano y cumpliendo tiempos y metas establecidas.
- Experiencia en gestión de compra de materiales y equipos para el sector Oil&Gas y refrigeración, mediante contacto directo de proveedores, ejecución de ordenes de compra y contratos, a su vez del seguimiento a fabricación y entrega de lo adquirido.

Persona con capacidad de liderazgo y trabajo en grupo con buenas relaciones interpersonales y enfoque hacia el crecimiento profesional, eficaz, eficiente y efectivo. 
------------------------------------
I am a Mechanical Engineer from the Universidad Nacional de Colombia, whose
performance is validated in:
- Experience in planning, designing, controlling and applying methodologies
of preventive and corrective maintenance of Mechanical equipment such as
Diesel Engines, Pumps, Compressor, etc.
- Experience in planning and control of projects, through the application of
engineering design for the adequate selection of equipment, human resources and
thus meeting established schedules and goals.
- Experience in managing the purchase of materials and equipment for the Oil
& Gas industry and Refrigeration sector, through direct contact with suppliers, issuing
of Purchase orders and contracts, and after that, the follow-up of the fabrication and
the delivery of the purchased material.
I am a person with leadership skills and teamwork with good interpersonal skills and
whose purpose is to have an efficient and effective professional growth. I have
complete willingness to learn and apply my knowledge every day.
response.skills: Gestión de mantenimiento, Negociaciones estratégicas, Negociación con proveedores, Gestión de compras, Microsoft Excel, SAP ERP, Gestión de proyectos, Mantenimiento preventivo planificado, Mantenimiento preventivo, Petróleo y gas natural, Energía, Planificación estratégica, Ingeniería, Estrategia empresarial, Planificación de proyectos, Ingeniería de proyectos, Industria del petróleo y del gas, Aprovisionamiento, Autodesk Inventor, Solid Edge

profile_positions.description:
Negotiate terms and conditions with suppliers.
Building supplier Database (or update the supplier into the existing Database).
Evaluate new suppliers, looking at the financial and commercial information.
Communication with other departments in the field of purchasing process.
Issue (using JDE Edwards) and notify the Purchase Orders (by email) to the Suppliers, as per negotiated terms and prices.
Monthly Report for the savings, overruns and blue chips regarding the activities.
Purchase of oil and gas equipment and services (Drilling Services, Well Services, Managed Pressure Drilling, Artificial-Lift Systems and Testing and Production Services)
profile_positions.title: Purchasing Analyst IV

profile_positions.description:
Negotiate terms and conditions with suppliers.
Building supplier Database (or update the supplier into the existing Database).
Evaluate new suppliers, looking at the financial and commercial information.
Communication with other departments in the field of purchasing process.
Issue (using SAP) and notify the Purchase Orders (by email) to the Suppliers, as per negotiated terms and prices.
Monthly Report for the savings and overrun of the projects.
Expedite the Purchase Order Confirmation from vendors.
Purchase of raw material (carbon steel (A36, A516), stainless steel (A304, A304L, A316, A316L), fittings, piping, other miscellaneous parts), equipment (Pressure and atmospherical vessels, heat exchangers, piping skids, pumps, motorized valves),
services (mechanical and electrical assembly).
profile_positions.title: Operational Buyer

profile_positions.description:
Negotiate and renegotiate Contracts with suppliers, leading all procurement process for the project.
Coordinate with suppliers to ensure on-time delivery/execution.
Preparate and process Purchase Orders and Documents in accordance with company policies and procedures.
Monitor Purchases through the delivery process.
Research and evaluate suppliers.
Weekly Report for the savings and overrun of the project (Parque Solar Fotovoltaico,
Sincé).
Expedite the Purchase Order Confirmation from vendors.
Purchase of raw material (wiring, cement, sand, electronic components), equipment (Transformation center, transformers, inverters), services (Mechanical and electrical assembly, civil works).
profile_positions.title: Coordinador de compras

profile_positions.description:
Managing and executing of the supplier selection process (domestic and foreign), through sending ITBs (RFQ, RFI, RFP), as well as doing the negotiations meetings to ensure the best commercial agreements for the company.
Evaluating the suppliers to contribute to the monitoring and the correct improvement,
as well as the development of new suppliers.
Making weekly reports through KPI indicators compliance (taking two factors: PO issuing dates and delivery of the material).
Coordinating Purchase and service Orders, ensuring compliance with the requirements.
Purchasing for energy sector equipment (Electricity generation with turbines and
engines)
profile_positions.title: Analista de Compras II

profile_positions.description:
Coordinate purchasing details with vendors and with the purchasing department; preparing and processing requisition forms, recommending vendors, and verifying budget codes and availability of funds.
Keeping contact and receiving formal quotes from appropriate vendors, comparing costs, and evaluating the quality and suitability of equipment, materials, and supplies.
Check invoices for accuracy and to evaluate the performance of the vendors to decide whether to continue buying from them in upcoming projects. Making negotiations meetings to get the best agreement for the company.
Projects: Offer Preparation for the ENAP BIO BIO and ACONCAGUA Refineries (Chile); Purchasing of equipment and material for Hidrocasanare Refinery revamping process; Purchasing of material (such as instrumentation, valves) for BAPCO MODERNIZATION PROGRAMM (BPM, Bahrain); expediting for the purchase orders of a different material (such as vessels, instrumentation, valves, metallic structure, pumping system, electronic components) for INEOS (USA); expediting for the purchased Material for Flint Hills Resources (FHR; USA).
profile_positions.title: Especialista comprador

profile_positions.description:
Design all the industrial refrigeration systems, making the appropriate selection of compressors, evaporators, condensers, intermediate and high temperature tanks, centrifugal pumps, valves, instrumentation and piping.
Make the P&ID diagrams, reviewing the thermal loads ensuring that the system
meets the customer’s needs.
Contact the suppliers of the different elements of all the system, and to follow up the purchase orders ensuring compliance with the commitment with the customer.
Negotiate prices and T&C with vendors in order to meet specified quality, delivery
and cost objectives.
Identify opportunities and implements actions to continually reduce wasted time, money and resources from project activities.
Supervise the fit-up of the equipment, pipes, valves, and instrumentations in the plant.
profile_positions.title: Ingeniero de proyecto

profile_positions.description:
The work as a mechanical engineer covered the monitoring and review of the different plans of preventive maintenance for equipment that were used in drilling operation. Carry out a review of the hours of engines (diesel, AC, DC), compressors, pumps, etc.
By managing SAP software, the function of creating fixed assets (form of identification of the different equipment company), by updating the own characteristics of each. In turn, a Check the lubrication charts of equipment, through discriminated systems according to which it belongs, verifying that mechanics are using the correct lubricant, in the correct place with the appropriate frequency.
profile_positions.title: Ingeniero de mantenimiento (Internship)

company.name: Weatherford
company.description: Weatherford International plc (Nasdaq: WFRD) is a leading global energy services company. Operating in approximately 75 countries, the Company answers the challenges of the energy industry with its global talent network of approximately 17,000 team members and approximately 350 operating locations, including manufacturing, research and development, service, and training facilities.
